sn46.5:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn46.5:1.6: Idha, bhikkhu, satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn46.5:1.7: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.5:1.8: Tassime satta bojjhange bhavayato kamasavapi cittam vimuccati, bhavasavapi cittam vimuccati, avijjasavapi cittam vimuccati.
sn46.5:1.10: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati.
